description.value:
As a bard, you select one muse at 1st level. This muse leads you to great things, and might be a physical creature, a deity, a philosophy, or a captivating mystery.

  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Enigma Muse]{Enigma Muse}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Maestro Muse]{Maestro Muse}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Polymath Muse]{Polymath Muse}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Warrior Muse]{Warrior Muse}
